text: Old Dark House == Plot == Seeking shelter from a relentless rainstorm and landslides in a remote regions of Wales, five travelers are admitted to a old dark house. However, Horace says that their leader, Morgan, is a dangerous looking drinker. At the end, there is a duel. Phliph and Maggy know that Saul was let out by Morgan. Everybody hides in a closet. They fight; but Saul is killed by falling down the stairs, and Roger is injured. Morgan breaks out and saves Maraget and Gladys from being trapped in the closet. He then takes Saul's lifeless body upstairs. Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Horror movies
title: The Old Dark House (movie)
